resources.string: Greenly is here to make your city greener. Greenly allows you to recycle and get rewarded for your recycling efforts. You can recycle: metal, glass, paper, plastic, cartons/tetrapak, and batteries.\nGreenly shows you which materials are recyclable and where, whether drop-off or collection. Greenly gives you all the information needed to recycle. You can see your points statements and all your vouchers within the app.

Before you become a recycling master, 
please read through our
terms & conditions.

Once you’re happy you can accept below and start recycling.
I agree to Greenly’s terms & conditions
